MonsterTrait.Name: Deadly Precision
MonsterTrait.Text: The tosculi elite bow raider's ranged attacks do an extra 9 (2d8) damage (included below).

MonsterTrait.Name: Evasive
MonsterTrait.Text: Ranged weapon attacks against the tosculi elite bow raider have disadvantage.

MonsterTrait.Name: Keen Smell
MonsterTrait.Text: The tosculi elite bow raider has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

MonsterTrait.Name: Skirmisher
MonsterTrait.Text: The tosculi elite bow raider can Dash as a bonus action.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The tosculi elite bow raider makes two longbow attacks or two claws attacks.

MonsterAction.Name: Claws
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Longbow
MonsterAction.Text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (3d8 + 4) piercing damage.
